response.overview: Ingrid and Martha were close friends in their youth, when they worked together at the same magazine. Ingrid went on to become an autofiction novelist while Martha became a war reporter, and they were separated by the circumstances of life. After years of being out of touch, they meet again in an extreme but strangely sweet situation.
response.title: The Room Next Door

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
New York City, NY & Los Angeles, CA
